thread.title: Mitt Romney Delays Announcement on Utah Senate Run

author: Reid J. Epstein
title: Mitt Romney Delays Announcement on Utah Senate Run

organizations.name: mitt romney delays announcement on utah senate

text:
WASHINGTON—Former Massachusetts Gov. Mitt Romney said Wednesday he would delay a planned announcement regarding a run for the open Senate seat being vacated by Utah Republican Orrin Hatch, following the school shooting in Florida.
“Out of respect for the victims and their families, I will not be making an announcement tomorrow about the Senate race,” he wrote on Twitter.
